title: Blocks from a monumental Greek text
support: Two blocks of ceramic, presumably belonging to the same text. The surface of (b) is slightly more corroded than that of (a), but the dimensions are very similar.

p._: It is unclear without further study whether the letters were incised after firing (as Korhonen suggests), or actually moulded prior to firing (as their form would appear to suggest).

date._: later third to early first century BCE

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, but assumed to come from Catania, or elsewhere in eastern Sicily.
